header.base: bg-white shadow-sm border-b border-neutral-200 sticky top-0 z-40

desktop.link: text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors duration-200 relative

mobile.menu: absolute top-full left-0 right-0 bg-white shadow-lg border-t border-neutral-200 transform transition-transform duration-200
mobile.link: block px-4 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 hover:text-primary-600 hover:bg-neutral-50 border-b border-neutral-100 last:border-b-0

actions.button: p-2 text-neutral-700 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors duration-200 relative

cart.button: p-2 text-neutral-700 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors duration-200 relative
cart.badge: absolute -top-1 -right-1 bg-error-500 text-white text-xs rounded-full h-5 w-5 flex items-center justify-center font-semibold

breadcrumb.base: flex items-center space-x-2 text-sm text-neutral-600 py-4

pagination.item: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-md hover:bg-neutral-50 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors duration-200
pagination.prev: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-l-md hover:bg-neutral-50
pagination.next: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 bg-white border border-neutral-300 rounded-r-md hover:bg-neutral-50

tabs.item: py-2 px-1 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-500 hover:text-neutral-700 hover:border-neutral-300 transition-colors duration-200 border-b-2 border-transparent

sidebar.base: fixed inset-y-0 left-0 z-50 w-64 bg-white shadow-lg transform transition-transform duration-300
sidebar.header: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-neutral-200
sidebar.title: text-lg font-semibold text-neutral-900
sidebar.link: block px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 hover:text-primary-600 hover:bg-neutral-50 rounded-md transition-colors duration-200
